description: Triangle of coefficients of Chebyshev polynomials T_n (x).
comments: The row length sequence of this irregular array is A008619(n), n >= 0. Even or odd powers appear in increasing order starting with 1 or x for even or odd row numbers n, respectively. This is the standard triangle A053120 with 0 deleted. - _Wolfdieter Lang_, Aug 02 2014
